example.name: both args
example.text: These 3.8 million people also are eligible to get one percentage point off GMAC 's advertised finance rates , which start at 6.9 % for two - year loan contracts .
example.arg: to get one percentage point off GMAC 's advertised finance rates , which start at 6.9 % for two - year loan contracts
